Title: Creed II
Writer: Juel Taylor (screenplay by), Sylvester Stallone (screenplay by), Sascha Penn (story by), Cheo Hodari Coker (story by), Ryan Coogler (characters)
Actors: Michael B. Jordan, Sylvester Stallone, Tessa Thompson, Phylicia Rashad
Plot: Under the tutelage of Rocky Balboa, newly crowned heavyweight champion Adonis Creed faces off against Viktor Drago, the son of Ivan Drago.
Production: Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer Studios, New Line Cinema, Warner Bros.
